price: Denizi sakın olarak bırak! Şüphesiz onlar, suda boğulacak bir ordudur.
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'ruki al-baḥra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raqūna
